ValidationRule.description: If Account has operating hours, Shipping country should be canada and shipping state should valid two letter province codes by Canada Post
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( OR(ShippingCountry = "CA", ShippingCountry="CAN", ShippingCountry="CANADA", ShippingCountry="Canada", ShippingCountry="canada", ShippingCountry="ca", ShippingCountry="Ca", ShippingCountry="can", ShippingCountry="Can"), OR(NOT( ISBLANK( OperatingHoursId ) )), OR( LEN(ShippingState) < 2, NOT( CONTAINS("AB:BC:MB:NB:NL:NT:NS:NU:ON:PE:QC:SK:YT", ShippingState) )))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Shipping State must be valid two letter province codes by Canada Post
